name: Air-O-Drome Aviation
about: Air-O-Drome Aviation, LLC, is a reputable flight school located in Idaho, offering a comprehensive range of pilot training programs. We provide certifications for Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Flight Instructor (CFI), Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII), and Multi-Engine Instructor (MEI). Our training includes ground school courses, PSI testing, and aircraft rental services. With a focus on safety and proficiency, our experienced instructors guide students through each phase of their aviation journey. Whether you're pursuing a career in aviation or flying for personal enjoyment, Air-O-Drome Aviation is committed to delivering high-quality training to help you achieve your goals. Contact us to start your flying career today.
